author: Kieran Gill
title: This is a wake-up call for us, says angry Son - The Mail
text: SON HEUNG-MIN slammed Tottenham’s performance in their 4-2 defeat at Brighton and demanded they use it as a ‘wake-up call’ to keep their season on track.
